New Records: Nicholas Pooran scored 98 runs off 53 balls, the highest score in the match and a new record for him in the T20 World Cup
Key Match Events: West Indies' strong batting performance led to a 104-run victory over Afghanistan
Obed McCoy took 3 wickets for 14 runs, significantly contributing to Afghanistan's collapse
Pre-Game Insights: West Indies were chosen to bat first and exploited Afghanistan's bowlers' weaknesses, particularly in the PowerPlay
The match was crucial for both teams to secure a Super 8 berth
Post-Match Reflections: Nicholas Pooran's dismissal was controversial, but the victory ensured West Indies' progression
The match highlighted the importance of strategic batting and bowling performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The toss was won by Afghanistan, but they struggled to chase down the target
The match score of 218 for West Indies was the highest in the tournament so far
